home.title: Codsiyada shaqada
home.subtitle: Soo geli shahaadooyinkaaga, ku dar dalabka shaqo, oo la soco codsiyada. Fiican shaqaalaha nadiifinta, warshada, alaabta iyo marti-qaadka.
home.uploadDescription: Soo geli shahaadooyinkaaga, shahaadooyinka iyo talooyinka. Waxaan si toos ah u soo bixinnaa oo habaynnaa wax walba.
home.addJobsDescription: Ku dhejiso URL shaqo oo waxaan ku falanqaynaynaa shuruudaha si ay ula mid noqdaan xirfadahaaga.
home.trackDescription: Meel keliya ka la soco dhammaan codsiyada. U dhoofiya warbixinnada xafiisyada shaqada (RAV).
home.languageDescription: Isticmaal meesha luqaddaada, ka dibna samee dukumentiyada luqadda shirkadda shaqaalaysa.
home.ravDescription: Si toos ah u samee warbixinnada raadinta shaqada (Nachweis der persönlichen Arbeitsbemühungen) xafiisyada shaqo la'aanta Switzerland qaabka loo baahan yahay.
home.ctaTitle: Ma diyaar u tahay inaad bilowdo?
home.ctaSubtitle: Samee koonto bilaash ah oo maanta bilow maaraynta codsiyada.
home.footer: Kaalinta shaqaalaha si ay u helaan fursad kale.

auth.loginSubtitle: Gal si aad u maarayso codsiyada

dashboard.selectFile: Dooro faylka (PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT - Ugu badan 25MB)
dashboard.noDocuments: Weli lama soo gelin dukumentiyada. Soo geli shahaadooyinkaaga si aad u bilowdo!
dashboard.noApplications: Weli ma jiraan codsiyad. Ku dar dalabka shaqada si aad u bilowdo!

settings.title: Dejinta
settings.languageDescription: Dooro luqadahaaga la doorbido isgaarsiinta iyo dukumentiyada.
settings.motherTongueHint: Luqaddaada hooyo ee sameynta profile-ka shirkadda
settings.documentationLanguageHint: Luqadda caadiga ah dukumentiyada iyo codsiyada la sameeyay
settings.settingsSaved: Dejinta si guul leh ayaa loo kaydiyay!
